TemplatesÂ¶

Mako Template:

To handle flash messages when using Mako, insert the following into your templates:

<%namespace file=”apex:templates/flash_template.mako” import=”*”/> ${apex_head()}

Insert this line where you would like the Flash Messages to be displayed:

${apex_flash()}

Jinja Templates:

(Currently not working due to import issue, need to copy flash_template.jinja2 to your templates directory) {# import “apex:templates/flash_template.jinja2” as flash with context-#} {% import “flash_template.jinja2” as flash with context -%}

In the <head> section of your template:

{{ flash.apex_head() }}

Insert this line where you would like the Flash Messages to be displayed:

{{ flash.apex_flash() }}
